summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements: frontend currency symbol replacement (REQ-61), backend data model update (REQ-62), and price field formatting (REQ-63). The backend migration module ensures data preservation, and all key pages display INR symbols with proper formatting.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration module (migration.mo) for converting old price field to priceInInr
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Preserve existing booking and profile data structures' as a constraint, and 'Historical price migration or data conversion' as a non-goal. The migration.mo file implements price data conversion logic, which contradicts these specifications.
